docs.lead_paragraph: The federal government has given conditional approval to the first vaccine licensed to fight a deadly pig virus, and warmer weather appears to be slowing the spread of the disease that has been blamed in part for making bacon more expensive.

headline.main: USDA Gives Initial Approval to Pig Virus Vaccine
headline.print_headline: USDA Gives Initial Approval to Pig Virus Vaccine

docs.snippet: The federal government has given conditional approval to the first vaccine licensed to fight a deadly pig virus, and warmer weather appears to be slowing the spread of the disease that has been blamed in part for making bacon more expensive.
